tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Wait time,
review:
Firstly I want to say that the doctor *** ** **** ***** *** came late, he doesn‚Äôt have any respect or patience for concerned parents who tend to ask 1 or 2 questions, he‚Äôs just in a hurry to finish ur turn and doesn‚Äôt listen to u, thinks he Knows way too much than what he actually does, ******** ********* no empathy for his patients, **** *** ***** ***** ***** **** *** ** ********** ***** **** **** *********** 
Not worth it!! It‚Äôs a Complete wast e of time and money!!! 


We reached the location at 4pm even though the doctor told us to meet him at 5pm we went in to meet him only at 9pm 
My baby 1.7years old had a brain surgery, was on IV & NG feed! ***** **** **** **** ** **** ***** *** ********* ***** 
When he wouldn‚Äôt meet us at the time he told us he shouldn‚Äôt have asked us to come at that time! 
Fine we waited no matter how restless my baby kept getting we waited and what did we get in return 
‚Ä¢A doctor who dint have the patience to listen to us 
‚Ä¢Who had his own findings that dint make sense or he dint even explain when asked 
‚Ä¢Who dint have the patience to answer any question at all ******* ** *** ** ****** **** *** *** ** **** ** **** ***** 
‚Ä¢Who was in a hurry to finish up with us 
‚Ä¢*** ******* ** **** ** *** ***** ** * ****** *** **** **** ******* ** *** ******* **** *** ** 
‚Ä¢Who was so casual about a serious case and sent us out with no answers to anything *** **** ** **** ******** 
‚Ä¢the way he spoke it was so hard to understand anything at all (most of the time murmuring to himself) 

* ****** **** **** ******** ******** *** ******* ***** *** ******** ***** ******* *** ** *** ** *** ******** ** **** ** **** ****** *** ************ **** **** 
********* **** *** **** ***** *** ***** * **** **** *** **** * ********* **** * ** *********

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Wait time,
review: Doctor is impatient and talk rudely.,  **  ******* **** ** *** ** **** ** ****** ********* ** * ****** **  *** ********* ** ** ********** ** ******* *** ******* ** ** **** ******* ** * ****** ** **** ** **** ****** *** *** **** *** ******* ******* **** ******** ** ***  Did not look at patient past records. Collected fee first. ************ ** ****** *** *** ** ****** *** ****** **** Rude staff behaviour and dirty clinic, no minimum hygiene. very crowded place no sufficient seating arrangement  to patient and parents. With one month prior appointment booking which is off no use when visited. we wasted our time, values, energy, beliefs, and hope. Dr treated parents like .... He did not offer place to seat also during consultation process not only to us but for all. Even there is a two chair.  It's just hurting parents overall experience with him.

review: Consulted the doctor Vykuntaraju for Generalized Epilepsy treatment for teenager. Patiently heard out the issue and suggested medication. tags: Doctor friendliness,
review: Doctor I have visited your clinic on January 2020 for my baby.she was having seizures.you have suggested us for physiotherapy  and to take VALPARIN syrup to take 3.5ml twice a day and to visit after 6 months.I was in regular contact with my family doctor and he suggested me to do MRI scan.After scanning the report shows t2 white matter in brain.so what should I do further?....I am from west Bengal and not in the condition to visit your clinic due to COVID19 padmic...
